Hello,

@amvignesh

It should say "Press 3 to exit", but don't press 3. When the command window shows up, just type "1" and then press [ENTER].
After "Activation successful. 1 attempt used.
Press any key to exit...", you're done and you can go on with the next step.

Hello,


@amvignesh

Try the following:

1. Open the Activator and press "Restart Service". You may get an error.
2. Now press "Install / Uninstall KMService".
3. Click on "Activation Office 2010 VL".
4. Check if it's activated by clicking on "Activation check Office 2010".
5. See if it works now.

Oh, while you're on a virtual machine, disable share folders just to be on a safe side.

Hello,


@KrazyK89

No, sorry, I don't know that user. And no, it's not possible to get blocked from someone's torrent -page, but it is possible he/she has deleted his/her account. (Then all torrents will disappear) You should try to Google on the name to see if you can find any of his/her torrents.


@aira120589

First of all, please note that Ã¡ll Â® Games4theworld Downloads are 100% safe and 100% virus free.
The reason you have to turn of your AV is that if you keep it on, the whole Installation WILL NOT work. Also, you don't have actual trojans on your system; your AV will only detect them as a torjan/virus, because of the way the most Crack's are packed. (They look a lot similar to trojans, but they aren't in fact) 
I recommend you restart your PC, turn off your AV and then continue the Installation. If you're really afraid of getting viruses into your system (even) from a "trusted" uploader, then I recommend you do not ever Download a .torrent file again.
